attributes.action: help small business' and stop them from going under and help them NOW
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My family run a small business and we are in danger of losing it, and i mean within the next 3 months not within the next year or two.Its alright the PM keep saying he is going to help but we have seen nothing at the min.My family are not alone in this position.There are no loans,no grants,nothing to help us keep going until the credit crunch is over.I am in remission from cancer and should not have to work 2 jobs but thats what i am having to do as wihout my income we would be on benefits. Is that what the PM wants?,to see half the country on benefits because it cant afford to live? thats what it is going to come to.

rejection.details:
This petiton overlaps with several already in existence:  
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/SME-funding-SOS/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
